title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

items.title: Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On

ai.summary: Based on the available description, the video shows Jo discovering the power of Copilot Groups with a focus on making route planning easy. It positions Copilot Groups as an AI tool that simplifies routing tasks.
bullets: Primary focus: route planning made easy.
Emphasizes the power and ease of use of Copilot Groups.
takeaways: If your operations involve routing or field dispatch, the video highlights Copilot Groups as a potential way to simplify route planning.
Teams responsible for logistics or onsite services should note the emphasis on ease of use when evaluating automation tools.
Decision-makers should consider assessing Copilot Groups for workflows that rely on coordinated routing or group-based planning.
The AI framing suggests opportunities to reduce manual planning effort where applicable.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… KPMG leaders describe AI as a current, practical element of audit work, with tools that automate repetitive tasks, analyse entire data populations, support documentation and disclosures, and enable real-time audit management and client communication. The podcast highlights specific solutions (AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI, KPMG Clara/Clara for Clients), the client benefits, changing auditor roles, implementation challenges, data-security and regulatory considerations, and future outlooks.
bullets: AI enables analysis of full populations (AI Transaction Scoring Tool), reducing reliance on sampling.
Clara AI offers conversational assistance and specialised agents to support audit tasks and disclosure analysis.
KPMG Clara platform supports real-time audit management and modern client communication (Clara for Clients).
Adoption shifts auditors' roles and requires new competencies, while posing implementation and adaptation challenges.
Data security, regulatory environment and potential AI-related risks are key concerns discussed.
takeaways: Audits will increasingly use full-population analytics — expect audit procedures to move beyond traditional sampling.
Real-time platforms and client-facing tools may change audit timelines and communication patterns with providers.
Prioritise data security and regulatory readiness when engaging with AI-powered audit tools and portals.
Prepare teams for evolving auditor interactions and the new competencies needed to work with AI-driven audit processes.
Be ready to address AI-related risks and controls as part of the audit dialogue.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and supports NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The trailer was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings using DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode, and the game is a 3D real-time strategy RPG where players take the role of the Endministrator on Talos-II.
bullets: Arknights: Endfield launch announced with DLSS 4 and Multi Frame Generation support.
Trailer captured on GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra, DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode.
Game described as a 3D real-time strategy RPG set on Talos-II; player is the Endministrator of Endfield Industries.
Links provided for more information and official game channels.
NVIDIA GeForce channels and community portal promoted alongside the trailer.
takeaways: DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation is being deployed in a commercial game title, indicating production use of the technology.
The trailer demonstration on an RTX 5080 at 4K suggests high-end NVIDIA GPUs are the showcased hardware for DLSS 4 workloads.
Teams evaluating GPU infrastructure for game development, capture, or real-time rendering should note DLSS 4 compatibility as a factor in hardware and software support decisions.
